import React, { useState} from 'react' import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import {addProduct} from './api' import './App.css' import Heading from './Heading'; const ProductPanel = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', sellerNumber: '', description: '', price: '', discount: '', inventory: '', species: '', category: '', productId: '', plusPoints: '', brand: '', image: null }); const { title, sellerNumber, description, price, discount, inventory, species, category, productId, plusPoints, brand } = formData; const [redirect, setRediect] = useState(false); const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); addProduct(formData) .then(data=>{ setRediect(true); }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error); }) console.log(formData); } const redirectTo = () =>{ return redirect && } return (
{redirectTo()}
